p: Sera (20 μL) from three patients from 2017 were inoculated in cell culture tubes (Sarstedt, Australia) with Aedes albopictus C6/36 cell monolayers (American Type Culture Collection—CRL-1660). The cells were propagated and maintained in Leibovit ´z L-15 medium (Gibco, USA) supplemented with 5% fetal bovine serum (Cultilab, Brazil). The cells were incubated at 28°C, for 10 days. After this period, the supernatant was harvested, collected and kept at -70°C until RNA extraction.
